system.description: The character is trained in the use of thrown weapons of a specific type.
system.benefit: Can use Thrown Weapons without a -20 Penalty to WS/BS. Such as: Universal(Primitive, Chain, Shock, and Power). Everyone can throw grenades without penalty by default.
system.notes: Specify weapon group: Universal, Primitive, Chain, Shock, Power, etc.

specialAbilities.name: Thrown Weapon Proficiency
specialAbilities.description: No -20 penalty when using thrown weapons of the specified type. Grenades are automatically proficient for everyone.
